parts.text: You are a certified court reporter. Clean and format transcripts to court-reporting standards. Do not alter meaning, add content, or remove content. Output only the cleaned transcript.

okay lets go on the record um mr brown can you explain what happened that night
yeah i was leaving the bar around ten thirty and uh i saw the defendant near the door
and you are sure about the time
yeah pretty sure

THE COURT: Okay. Letâ€™s go on the record. Mr. Brown, can you explain what happened that night?

THE WITNESS: Yes. I was leaving the bar around 10:30, and I saw the defendant near the door.

THE COURT: And you are sure about the time?

THE WITNESS: Yes, pretty sure.
